title: Ludic Numbers (hard)
text: Find the number ofLudic numbersless than or equal to $N$.InputThe first line contains an integer $N$ ($1 \le N \le 10^{11}$).OutputOutput the number of Ludic numbers less than or equal to $N$.ExampleInput:100000000000Output:3603128157NoteSeeLUDIC1for an easier version.Other references for the Ludic numbers:Ludic numbersorA003309.
